summary: TypeScript SDK lacks support for updating schedules by cronExpression alone, causing issues with duplicate intervals and upcoming runs when attempting to update only the cron expression.
userImpact: Users cannot reliably update schedule cron expressions without manually managing intervals and calendars, requiring workarounds.
rootCause: Temporal Server applies cron expressions to existing intervals instead of replacing them during update operations.
proposedFix: Add support for updating schedules by cronExpression, ensuring existing intervals and calendars are properly cleared during the update.
workaround: Manually delete intervals and calendars from ScheduleUpdateOptions when updating cronExpression.
keyQuote: temporal is not wiping the existing intervals out as part of the update, but it's applying the cron expressions to those intervals
